item.description: About me I am an Assistant Professor of Accounting at the University of California San Diego, Rady School of Management. I obtained a Ph.D. in Finance from Université Paris-Dauphine in December 2018 and I hold Master degrees in Computer Engineering and Artificial Intelligence. Prior to my Ph.D., I published research articles in machine learning. Since then I have developed broad research interests that include Accounting, Financial Intermediation, Corporate Finance, FinTech, and Big Data in accounting and finance.
